data.title: "Ness Wadia is not dating Lisa Haydon"
data.meta_description: Deveika Bhojwani clears the air about the Wadia scions role in her son Karan and Lisa Haydons breakup
data.text:
Synopsis

Deveika Bhojwani clears the air about the Wadia scion’s role in her son Karan and Lisa Haydon’s breakup

Mumbai cops are seeking clarity from actress Preity Zinta on the abuse charges she has levelled against her ex-boyfriend and fellow Kings XI Punjab team coowner Ness Wadia, but there is another person dragged into the controversy.

#Budget' 2024 with ET

Union Budget and Economic Survey 2024 Live Updates

There’s intense speculation that Zinta filed the police complaint, termed by Wadia as “baseless”, allegedly b e c aus e o f the new girl in his life — model-turnedactress Lisa Haydon. However, Haydon has found a surprising ally in Deveika Bhojwani, who revealed that Wadia did not break up the model’s engagement to her son Karan.

“Someone started this rumour that Ness had something to do with Karan and Lisa’s breakup. It gained momentum because Ness is in the news,” Bhojwani told ETPanache, “But there is no truth to these rumours. Lisa isn’t seeing Ness.”

Lisa’s ex-fiance Karan is currently on a trip to Chennai, but clarified that the reports were “complete rubbish”. “Ness is one of my best friends. Lisa and I get along very well too. We are all on the best terms possible. The people involved know the truth and that is what matters.”

Zinta filed a complaint against Wadia on June 14, alleging that he had verbally abused, manhandled and threatened her inside Wankhede stadium on May 30, when their IPL team Kings XI Punjab was playing against the Chennai Super Kings. The next day, newspaper reports quoting sources close to Wadia claimed that Zinta was reacting out of jealousy because she could not take Wadia moving on with a “dusky model-turned-actress who recently broke off her engagement”.

Haydon and Bhojwani, who were engaged in February 2013, broke up in January this year. The actress, who tasted success for her bohemian turn in this year’s hit Queen, attended the Gladrags Mrs India race event in March as Wadia’s guest, sparking speculation that she’s dating the industrialist. Deveika Bhojwani, however, added that Haydon resents being dragged into the Zinta-Wadia mess. “Lisa is very upset with such allegations, as are all of us”.
